name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cúram File Edit Native Messaging Bridge

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manages Microsoft Word Document editing from the Google Chrome and Microsoft Edge browsers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cúram File Edit Native Messaging Bridge extension has been replaced by SPM File Edit Native Messaging Bridge.

This native messaging based extension is for use with the Cúram Social Program Management (SPM) product.

The Word Integration Assistant is distributed with Cúram Social Program Management Platform.

This extension communicates with the Word Integration Assistant Java application installed on a user machine using message passing APIs.

By adding this extension to Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge on a Windows machine that has the Word Integration Assistant installed, users will be able to edit a Microsoft Word document on their local computer and then save it to the Cúram SPM database.

This extension is designed to be used with v8 or v7 of Cúram SPM. 
For v7 of Cúram SPM, the Word Integration Assistant is supported for Google Chrome only.
